fields.description: This model gains an additional Activation Counter. An Enemy model may cancel this Ki Feat by spending 1 Ki Token, this model gains that Ki Token, and the Ki Feat has no other effect but is still considered to have been used this turn.
fields.name: Alacrity

fields.description: Target Enemy model in BtB gains Slow until the End Phase.
fields.name: Chill

fields.description: Friendly Bushi models in the Aura do not suffer the Melee Penalty for having Run.
fields.name: To the Front!

fields.description: Until the End Phase, while in BtB with another Friendly Tengu Bushi, this model and ├èFriendly Tengu Bushi in BtB with this model gain Parry (+1). A model can only benefit from this feat once, though it does stack with other sources of Parry.
fields.name: Defensive Line

fields.description: When this model Runs or Charges this activation, any model moved through gains a Stunned Marker and a Fire (1) Marker. During this movement, this model may move through Destructible terrain. If it does, remove the terrain from the battlefield.
fields.name: Storm Path

fields.description: Call Lightning Ranged Attacks gain +1 Strength and Slam Attack (0) until the current activation is complete.
fields.name: Surge

fields.description: When this model declares a Ranged Attack Action choose one of the following until the current Ranged Attack Action is resolved: • This model's Cannon Weapon gains Slam Attack (0). • Draw a line between this model and the Target model. Any model the line crosses and any model within 1" of those models gain a Fire (2) Marker. • If the attack is successful, centre a 2" Pulse on the Target model. Models within the Pulse suffer a Damage Roll with the same Success Level as the Target model and gain a Stunned Marker.
fields.name: Cannon Manipulation

fields.description: Deploy a Signal Flag in BtB with this model if one is available.
fields.name: Rangefinder

fields.description: Before a Damage Roll on this model, this model's Controller may flip a coin and call heads or tails. If they call successfully, this model instead takes no damage. Otherwise, this model takes normal damage. This feat may only be used once per Damage Roll.
fields.name: All-In

fields.description: Until the End Phase, when Target model performs a Test, their Controller rolls an additional die. This model's Controller must remove a dice of their choice from that Test before it is resolved. For a Melee Exchange, this occurs after dice allocation is revealed. The additional dice may be Attack or Defence and the removed dice must be of the same type.
fields.name: Gambler's Ruin

fields.description: Use this Ki Feat at the start of any Activation. Move this model up to 4" towards an Enemy table edge (any edge which touches an enemy deployment zone). At the end of this Activation, Move this model 4" towards the opposite table edge.
fields.name: Tidal Flow

fields.description: Target Enemy model becomes Berserk until the end of its next activation. While Berserk, it treats all models as Enemy models. Until the End Phase, this model gains 1 Ki Token for each Wound caused by the Target in a Melee Exchange.
fields.name: Ire

fields.description: Target Enemy model gains a Blind marker.
fields.name: Illusion

fields.description: If this model is successful the Targeted model gains Stupid until the End Phase.
fields.name: Seduction

fields.description: Replace this model with its other form (Fox Form
fields.name: Shapeshift

fields.description: Until the End Phase, Target Friendly model with a Control Marker gains +1 to its Melee Pool and Ranged Pool while it has a Control Marker.
fields.name: Restitution

fields.description: When a Friendly model kills a Kami model in a Melee Exchange while in the Aura, you may replace the Kami by Summoning and Deploying a Friendly, 8 Rice Cost Kami with identical Elemental Icons. If the Enemy has no Elemental Icons, you may replace it with a Void Kami.
fields.name: Rectifying Shomyo

fields.description: When Target, non-Exhausted model next activates, you may choose a valid Simple Action for it to perform. The model's Controller must resolve the chosen Action. If the Target does not Activate before the End Phase, this effect expires.
fields.name: Dharma

fields.description: Your Opponent must choose either a Death Sentence marker or a Control Marker. Target Enemy model gains one of the chosen Marker.
fields.name: Final Verdict

fields.description: Until the End Phase, if Target Enemy modeldeclares an action other than Focus it gains a Control Marker once the action is resolved, unless it has a Control Marker when the action is declared.
fields.name: Kannagara

fields.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse makes a Test or a Damage Roll, it may reroll one of its own dice in that test or roll. Dice may only be rerolled once due to this Ki Feat.
fields.name: Inari's Luck

fields.description: Kairai models cannot be Deployed in the Aura. Models in the Aura cannot be Replaced with Kairai models.
fields.name: Requiem

fields.description: While within the Aura, each inch moved counts as 2 incehs for any Enemy model's movement. This model cannot be Targeted by Enemy Effects, and Enemy models cannot enter BtB with this model.
fields.name: Majesty

fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation when it begins a movement in the Pulse, once the movement is completed this model may Walk up to its Move towards that model's final position.
fields.name: Shadow

fields.description: When a Friendly model in the Pulse is selected for a Melee Action or targeted by a Charge Action, this model becomes the new selected or targeted model. If the Enemy model has enough movement to reach the original model, it is instead moved into BtB with this model by the shortest route, regardless of its actual movement.
fields.name: Intercept

fields.description: Target Friendly model gains Tireless until the End Phase.
fields.name: Hunt

fields.description: For each model that would cause a Melee Assist Penalty on this model (even if it is ignored by the Indomitable trait), this model gains +1 Melee Pool and +1 Melee Weapon Strength until the end of the current Melee Exchange.
fields.name: Absolute Mastery

fields.description: This model gains Reach and its Hook Swords Weapon gains Chain Weapon (1) until the end of the current activation.
fields.name: Linked Swords

fields.description: Before the Enemy model chooses a Weapon to use in a Melee Exchange, choose a Weapon they have access to. For the rest of the current activation, replace that Weapon on the Enemy model's card with: Unarmed (-2 Melee Strength, no Traits, no Specials).
fields.name: Pin Weapon

fields.description: A Friendly Unblessed model in BtB gains the Blessing of Steel Enhancement - Equipment card if permitted.
fields.name: Bless

fields.description: While Target Friendly Metal Kami is within 6" of an Enemy model, Friendly models with no other Friendly models within 3" of them gain Armour (X). X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on the Kami.
fields.name: Empower

fields.description: Target model gains Fear (4) and Weapons used in Attacks made against that model gain Pierce (-2) (to a minimum of 0) until the end of the current activation.
fields.name: Irokane Protection

fields.description: This model gains Feint (+1) until the end of the current Melee Exchange.
fields.name: Kote Men

fields.description: Target Enemy model gains Aggressive until the End Phase.
fields.name: Taunt

fields.description: Friendly Juhin, Kaizoku, and Kancho models in the Aura gain Spirit (1).
fields.name: Admirable

fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon's Range Bands become
fields.name: Long Throw

fields.description: After making a Scenario Action, this model gains an Activation Counter.
fields.name: Agility

fields.description: This model gains Rapid Fire (3) until the end of the current activation. During a Ranged Attack Action, for each Ranged Attack that has already been successful this activation, this model's Bombs Weapon increases its long range by 2".
fields.name: Enthusiasm

fields.description: This model gains Mettle (1) until the end of the current activation.
fields.name: Dragon's Focus

fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (
fields.name: Dragon's Presence

fields.description: This model gains Grapple Attack (0) and Grapple Defence (0) until the end of the current activation. If this model successfully applies one of these Special Abilities, the Enemy model suffers one Wound.
fields.name: Choke Hold

fields.description: Remove any Disease and Bleed Markers from the Target model.
fields.name: Cauterise

fields.description: Target model that you own makes a Ki Challenge Test (5). If successful, unmark all Wound boxes. If it fails, the Target is Killed.
fields.name: Kill or Cure

fields.description: After a Melee Exchange with this model is complete, Target Enemy model becomes Held.
fields.name: Hoarfrost

fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon gains Brutal (1) and Reload (+1).
fields.name: Brawn

fields.description: Choose a State other than Reloading. Target model gains Immune [Chosen State] until the End Phase.
fields.name: Elders' Aegis

fields.description: This first time this turn an Enemy model Moves into BtB with this model, place this model within 2" of its current location, but not into an Enemy model's ZoC.
fields.name: Flitter

fields.description: Friendly models with Cloudwalk that are within the Pulse may be placed within 2" of their current position. This feat does not affect models in BtB with Enemy models. Models cannot be pplaced into an Enemy ZoC.
fields.name: Fujin's Will

fields.description: When this model Runs this activation, it may Move through other Friendly models. It may not end its Move occupying the same area as an Impassable Terrain element or another model. Any model moved through can Move 1".
fields.name: Slipstream

fields.description: Place Target Model within 1" of its current location. If the Target model is an Enemy, you must first succeed in an Opposed Ki Test with the Target model.
fields.name: Voice of the Wind

fields.description: When this model causes Damage with its Bird Strike Weapon, the Target gains a Blind Marker.
fields.name: Eye Peck

fields.description: Until the end of the current activation, each time this model would make a Damage Roll in a Melee Exchange, instead the Enemy model removes an Activation Counter.
fields.name: Nerve Strike

fields.description: This model gains Strong until the current action is resolved.
fields.name: Weight of Shadows

fields.description: Place the Conjured Shadow Crows template in BtB with this model.
fields.name: Shadow Crows

fields.description: Enemy models ending a move in the Aura or Placed into the Aura must turn to directly face this model. This Model loses Camouflage while using this Ki Feat.
fields.name: Threat

fields.description: When using this model's Blowgun weapon, instead of rolling a Damage Roll, you may choose to inflict 1 Damage ignoring Tough.
fields.name: Pinprick

fields.description: This model's Garrotte Weapon gains Critical Attack (0) and Powerful Attack (0).
fields.name: Strangulation

fields.description: For the next Rope Dart Ranged attack, if successful, move the target Small or Tiny model directly toward this model until it contacts impassable terrain or any model.
fields.name: Goh

fields.description: This Feat can only be used while this model is Elsewhere. When an Enemy model deploys using the Flank Trait, this model may ignore its current deployment choices for its Flank Trait and deploy within 3" of the Enemy model but not in its ZoC or BtB. This model generates two Activation Counters when Deployed using this Feat.
fields.name: Insurgent

fields.description: Perform a Walk with Target Enemy model directly toward this model equal to its Move statistic in inches. At the end of the Walk the Enemy model must directly face this model.
fields.name: Entice

fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation in which it enters BtB with this model, that Enemy model gains a Frightened Marker. Remove the Frightened Marker in the End Phase.
fields.name: Warning Rattle

fields.description: This model gains Believer [Shisai] (
fields.name: Dragon's Awe

fields.description: Use this Ki Feat during the Starting Phase. This model gains a Berserk Marker and gains Strong until the End Phase.
fields.name: Rage

fields.description: Target Enemy model gains Slow and Weak until the End Phase.
fields.name: Grasp of Darkness

fields.description: Target Friendly Oni in BtB suffers one Wound ignoring Armour and Tough. This model gains an Oni Blood Token.
fields.name: Bloodletting

fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Horde Bakemono in BtB with this model. If there are no Bakemono cards available with a free Wound Track this feat cannot be used.
fields.name: Call the Horde

fields.description: Targte Bakemono gains an additional X unmarked Wound boxes until the End Phase. Mark Wounds on these Wound boxes first. X cannot be greater than 3.
fields.name: Council's Shield

fields.description: Place 4 Doom Tokens on Target model. During the Starting Phase remove a Doom Token. When the last Doom Token is removed the model suffers 7 Wounds.
fields.name: Curse of Doom

fields.description: Deploy any Oni or Onisho model that was not recruited by the Warband into play, exhausted, within 3" of this model with 3 Control Markers on it.  If the summoned model ever has zero Control Markers, remove it from play.
fields.name: Dark Summons

fields.description: This model gains Disturb Flow (
fields.name: Discordant Melody

fields.description: Each Friendly Bakemono within the Pulse gains 1 Virtue Token.
fields.name: Frenzied Rythm

fields.description: This model's Ranged Weapon Range Bands become
fields.name: Heave

fields.description: All Bakemono not in BtB with an Enemy model within the Pulse's area of effect may make a 2" Walk.
fields.name: Marching Beat

fields.description: Until the end of the current activation, if Target other Bakemono must make a Disguise or Fear Test, this model makes the Test instead. Target model may attempt the Disguise Test as if it had Ki Stat 2 or higher. While making Tests for the Target, this model gains Bravery and loses Cowardly.
fields.name: Mind Control

fields.description: During an Enemy model's activation, when that model moves into BtB with another Friendly Bakemono model in the Pulse, move this model into BtB with that Enemy model by the shortest route. If it is not possible to put this model in BtB with the Enemy model this feat cannot be used.
fields.name: Pile On!

fields.description: Replace this model with the Zoo model. Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Zoo's profile card has the same number of Wounds marked as Xi-Han. Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any Tokens to Zoo's profile card, Zoo gains an Impetuous Marker.  When this effect expires in the End Phase, replace Zoo with Xi-Han. Recover or Inflict Wounds so that Xi-Han's profile has the same number of Wounds marked as Zoo. Transfer State Markers, Enhancements, and any tokens to Xi-Han's profile card.
fields.name: Reiji Kinoko

fields.description: Target Enemy model suffers -3 Move until the End Phase.
fields.name: Shadow Tendrils

fields.description: When an Enemy model is Killed within the Pulse, this model may Heal a number of Wounds and gain a number of Ki Tokens equal to the removed model's Ki Statistic.
fields.name: Soul Thirst

fields.description: When a Friendly Onisho model deals damage in a Melee Exchange in the Pulse, if this model is not in BtB or an Enemy model's ZoC, once the Melee Exchange is resolved this model may immediately Charge the Enemy model. Neither model loses Activation Counters for this Charge or for participating in the Melee Exchange. If the Enemy model is removed from play only this model may use the Consume Soul Ki Feat this activation.
fields.name: Stolen Glory

fields.description: Target Enemy model gains one Spirit Block Marker and Insignificant until the End Phase.  X is equal to the Ki Statistic of the Targeted Enemy model.
fields.name: Strip Soul

fields.description: Move this model 1".
fields.name: Scuttle

fields.description: Until the End Phase Target Frightened Enemy model may only declare Disengage, Stand Up and Wait actions.
fields.name: Cower

fields.description: Summon and Deploy a Sagoya Kaidan within 3" of Target Enemy model. It may not be placed in an Enemy model's ZoC or in BtB with an Enemy model. Place a number of Ki Tokens on Sagoya Kaidan's profile card equal to the number spent for this Ki Feat instead of any from the Kami trait when deployed. There may only be one Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play at any time. This model cannot use this Ki Feat if there is already a Friendly Sagoya Kaidan in play.
fields.name: Manifest Fear

fields.description: Enemy models in the Pulse gain a Frightened Marker. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.
fields.name: Horrify

fields.description: Frightened models in the Pulse take a Success Level 2 Damage Roll. X is equal to the number of Ki Tokens on this model after paying for this Ki Feat.
fields.name: Thanatophobia
